ygData.subject: Re: newbie stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s you :)... my Hand to Hand is at 50-something, and I ve never used it WITHOUT an instrument in my hand. ;)
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 3 Dec 1999 silky@... wrote:

> From: silky@...
>
> And no - your weapon is hand to hand - although I've NEVER had mine raise a
> single point if a instrument was equipped. I think there might be something
> screwy in the code where hand to hand only raises if you are totally
> without anything in your grasp - or maybe it's just been me.

It's you :)... my Hand to Hand is at 50-something, and I've never
used it WITHOUT an instrument in my hand. ;)

.....................................Selianth Jongleure
.....Bard of 24 Songs
.....The Divine Alliance
.....Cazic-Thule

Beth Frantz "The musician's art is to send light
beth@... into the depths of men's hearts"
--Robert Schumann
